overview: Body sculpting featuring Zumba toning and Zumba Sentao programs.  This mega-intense, body-sculpting workout led by Beto, creator of the Zumba program, and his star trainers will leave you on the edge of your seat!  Set to high-energy Zumba fitness music, you'll start with a toning workout featuring our exclusive Zumba Toning Sticks and end with a breakthrough Zumba Sentao chair routine designed to build lean muscle and define your entire body.
title: Zumba Fitness: Ripped
